system.description: Your ability to rally and inspire extends beyond your own kind, drawing strength from any nearby allies.
system.benefit: The Ork now also gains the Benefits of Mob Rule (+10 to Resist effects of Fear and Pinning) for every Two Non-Orks that do not have the Machine Trait, are not Wild Animals, and are not Lesser Greenskins (Gretchin/Squigs/Snotlings) within 10 Metres.

characteristics.condition: Per 2 valid non-Ork allies within 10m, to resist Fear/Pinning

specialAbilities.name: Extended Mob Rule
specialAbilities.description: Gain +10 to resist Fear/Pinning for every 2 non-Ork allies (excluding Machines, Wild Animals, Lesser Greenskins) within 10m.
